thread.title: Glencore Earnings: What to Watch
thread.title_full: Glencore Earnings: What to Watch - WSJ

author: Alex MacDonald
title: Glencore Earnings: What to Watch
text:
Commodities titan Glencore PLC, the world’s third largest diversified miner by market capitalization, is scheduled to report first-half earnings on Wednesday. Here’s what you need to know:
EARNINGS FORECAST: First-half net profit is forecast to fall 58% to $728 million in the first half of the year compared with the same period a year... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
